description: Raphael’s is taking Southern BBQ straight to you, and digging into this delicious and authentic North Carolina BBQ is an awesome way to celebrate any Owasso occasion. Their menu features every craveable BBQ dish, like Pulled Pork, BBQ Ribs, Bratwurst, BBQ Chicken, and so much more. And don’t be shy, and be sure to pile on their sides of Baked Beans, Chili, Corn Cobblettes, and other tasty eats.And if you’re looking for meals on the Owasso streets, trek on out to Raphael’s trailer and treat yourself to their BBQ Nachos with your choice of pulled pork, beef, or chicken with nacho cheese, BBQ sauce, and jalapenos. Or have yourself a tasty part-tay with their Southern BBQ Parfait- 16 oz. cup with baked beans, pulled pork, BBQ sauce, and cheddar cheese sauce, topped with creamy Carolina-style coleslaw. With all this incredible food, it’s no wonder Oklahoma foodies have fallen in love with Raphael’s Southern BBQ.
name: Raphael's Southern BBQ
